tips.title: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
tips.content: Follow the 3 R's hierarchy: First reduce consumption, then reuse items creatively, and finally recycle when necessary.

tips.title: Circular Economy Benefits
tips.content: Circular economy keeps resources in use longer, reduces waste, and creates economic value while protecting the environment.

tips.title: Fast Fashion Impact
tips.content: The fashion industry produces 20% of global wastewater and 10% of carbon emissions. Buying second-hand clothes helps combat this!

tips.title: Electronics Recycling
tips.content: E-waste contains precious metals and toxic materials. Buying refurbished electronics and proper recycling helps recover materials safely.

tips.title: Furniture Upcycling
tips.content: Give old furniture new life through upcycling! Sand, paint, and repair instead of buying new. It's creative and eco-friendly.

tips.title: Carbon Footprint Reduction
tips.content: Buying second-hand can reduce carbon footprint by up to 80% compared to new items. Every purchase makes a difference!
